title: Relief Fragment with Hieroglyphs
description:
Oblong fragment of limestone with five columns of hieroglyphs in raised relief. The piece is from the tomb of Semenkhuw-ptah called Itwesh at Saqqara (MM D43). A border is preserved at the right of the inscription; neither the top or bottom of any of the columns of text is preserved.
Condition: Stone darkened; small chips.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
